attributes.action: ensure a fair accurate independent expert review on the breed american xl bully
attributes.additional_details: This will have a huge impact on dog owners given how many pet owners rely upon pet dogs for more reasons that the average person might expect one being those who purchase a pet dog in good faith for example a person who has a pet dog as a companion this may feel almost like an attack on a persons family member ensuring the public  a open independent review will ensure the public safety and confidence that a frivolous campaign will not target pet owners under the banner of poor pet ownership
attributes.background: The figures relating recent fatal dog attacks unjustifiably low to consider any specific  breed being accountable for dangerous  dogs in the U K a independent  review would be fair to all uk pet dog owners especially those hundreds of thousands  who currently competently & lawfully own bully’s

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control
